AboutPage.heroSubtitle: Modern Living, Managed with Heart. Discover a new standard of comfort and convenience in the city.
AboutPage.storyParagraph1: Founded with a simple vision to provide high-quality, secure, and comfortable living spaces, SARAGEA Appartments has grown into a trusted name in residential management. We believe a home is more than just four walls; it's a foundation for your life.
AboutPage.storyParagraph2: As we grew, we saw the need to blend our traditional values of excellent service with the power of modern technology. This led to the creation of this digital platform, designed to make your rental experience seamless and stress-free.
AboutPage.digitalTitle: How It Works: Your Digital Renting Journey
AboutPage.digitalSubtitle: We've automated the entire process, putting you in control.
AboutPage.step1Desc: Browse our properties with high-quality photos, 3D tours, and detailed information. Filter by location, price, and amenities to find your perfect match.
AboutPage.step2Desc: Found a room you love? Reserve it instantly online and upload your documents securely through your personal dashboard.
AboutPage.step3Desc: Receive monthly invoices automatically. Pay your rent securely online via Mobile Money or Bank Transfer with just a few clicks. No more queues, no more hassle.
AboutPage.step4Desc: Report maintenance issues through your dashboard, track their status in real-time, and communicate directly with our management team.
AboutPage.value1Desc: Your safety is our top priority, with 24/7 security and modern safety features.
AboutPage.value2Desc: We provide well-maintained spaces with essential amenities for a comfortable lifestyle.
AboutPage.value3Desc: From digital leases to online payment history, every interaction is clear and straightforward.

FaqPage.heroSubtitle: Find answers to frequently asked questions about living at SARAGEA.

questions.q1: What is included in the monthly rent?
questions.a1: Monthly rent typically includes water and 24/7 security. Electricity and Internet are usually handled separately per unit.
questions.q2: How do I reserve an apartment?
questions.a2: Simply find a room you like, click 'Reserve Now', and follow the instructions to upload your documents. Our team will review your application within 24 hours.
questions.q3: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.a3: We accept M-Pesa, Tigo Pesa, Airtel Money, and Bank Transfers. All payments are processed securely through our automated system.
questions.q4: How do I report a maintenance issue?
questions.a4: Login to your dashboard, go to the Maintenance section, and click 'Submit New Request'. You can track the status of your repair in real-time.
questions.a5: Yes, we typically require a security deposit equivalent to one month's rent before move-in. This is refundable at the end of your lease.
questions.q6: Can I use social media to log in?
questions.a6: Absolutely! You can sign up and log in using your Google, Facebook, or Apple account for a faster experience.

PrivacyPage.heroSubtitle: Your privacy is our priority. Learn how we protect and manage your data at SARAGEA.

sections.s1_content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as your name, email, phone number, and identity documents when you reserve a room or create an account.
sections.s2_content: Your data is used to process your reservations, manage your lease agreements, process payments securely, and communicate maintenance updates.
sections.s3_content: We do not sell your data. We only share necessary information with trusted partners like payment gateways (Selcom, Flutterwave) and storage providers (Cloudinary) to fulfill our services.
sections.s4_content: We implement 256-bit encryption and secure server protocols to ensure your documents and payment information are shielded from unauthorized access.
sections.s5_content: You have the right to access, correct, or request the deletion of your personal data at any time through your dashboard or by contacting support.

PrivacyPage.contactDesc: If you have any questions about this policy, please reach out to our legal team.

TermsPage.heroSubtitle: Please read these terms carefully. They govern your use of the SARAGEA platform and rental services.

sections.s1_content: By accessing SARAGEA, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations in Tanzania.
sections.s2_content: You must be at least 18 years old to create an account or reserve a property. By using this site, you represent that you meet this age requirement.
sections.s3_content: Reservations are subject to availability and document verification. Payments made through the platform are non-refundable unless specified in your specific lease agreement.
sections.s4_content: Tenants agree to provide accurate information, maintain the property in good condition, and report any maintenance issues promptly through the dashboard.
sections.s5_content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms, engage in fraudulent activity, or fail to complete required payments.
sections.s6_content: SARAGEA is not liable for indirect or consequential damages arising from your use of the platform or temporary service interruptions.

TermsPage.agreeDesc: If you need clarification on any of these terms, our support team is happy to help.
